de.stroeer.proxity.gateway

Class Gateway

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.stroeer.proxity.gateway.Gateway

  • public class Gateway
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by dustin on 21.07.15. Is responsible for: - holding: - a list of IGatewayListeners - list of last messages - manages the IGatewayListener - adding addListener(de.stroeer.proxity.gateway.Gateway.IGatewayListener) - removeing removeListener(de.stroeer.proxity.gateway.Gateway.IGatewayListener) - Notifications for - debug notifyDebug(ResponseCode, String, Serializable) - warnings notifyWarning(ResponseCode, String), notifyWarning(ResponseCode, String, Serializable) - infos notifyInfo(ResponseCode, String), notifyInfo(ResponseCode, String, Serializable) - failures notifyFailure(ResponseCode, String), notifyFailure(ResponseCode, String, Serializable) - all messages notifyMessage(Message, boolean) - Send all current messages again resendCurrentMessages() - Clear all current messages clearMessages() - Send all current states again resendCurrentState() - Notifies on status lsiteners and broadcasts and writes logs if connection dependencies are: - added onConnectionDependenciesAdded(Integer, boolean) - removed onConnectionDependenciesRemoved(Integer, boolean) - Set the minimal log level setMinLogLevel(MessageType) - inner classes: - interface IGatewayListener - enum MessageType
